title: Mexico faces humanitarian crisis as Biden migration policy kicks in
description: The desperation at a migrant camp in Matamoros, a half-mile from the U.S. border, underscored the questions swirling around Biden's new migration policy.

title: Kemal Dervis, taskmaster who helped rescue Turkey’s economy, dies at 74
description: Kemal Dervis was known for his blunt assessments of the Turkish economy, forcing through unpopular austerity measures.

title: Israel and Islamic Jihad agree to cease-fire, ending five-day conflict
description: Israel and Islamic Jihad, the Gaza-based militant group, agreed to a cease-fire Saturday night, ending a five-day bout of violence that killed at least 35 people.

title: Zelensky interview transcript: ‘Ukraine must win’
description: In an interview with The Washington Post, Ukraine's president discussed the much anticipated counteroffensive, leaked U.S. intelligence documents and the U.S. presidential election.

title: Zelensky, in private, plots bold attacks inside Russia, leak shows
description: THE DISCORD LEAKS | Intercepts reveal Zelensky's aggressive instincts, a marked contrast to his image as the stoic statesman weathering Russia’s onslaught.

title: Cyclone Mocha rapidly intensifies ahead of devastating landfall in Myanmar and Bangladesh
description: The storm had sustained winds of 150 mph late Saturday, or just shy of Category 5. Massive storm surge is likely near landfall in northern Myanmar.

title: How a U.S. president known for antisemitism became godfather of Israel
description: Harry Truman used antisemitic slurs in private. But his surprise decision 75 years ago to recognize Israel, launching a fierce alliance, was a long time coming.

title: Zelensky to meet Pope Francis at Vatican for first time during Ukraine war
description: Zelensky is rallying his European allies this weekend ahead of a planned counteroffensive on the battlefield.

title: Eurovision Song Contest 2023: Ukraine tributes and hot pants
description: At the 67th Eurovision Song Contest in Liverpool, wartime tributes jostle against kitsch and extreme silliness.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Russian strikes reported in three cities; concerns over safety at nuclear plant
description: Ukrainian officials announced air alerts throughout the country early Saturday, reporting injuries in the cities of Nikopol, Khmelnytskyi and Mykolaiv.

title: Inside a Ukrainian military hospital, gruesome wounds and resilience
description: The hospital is a few hours’ drive from the bloodiest battles— some patients arrive already stabilized; others show up near death.

title: Erdogan’s political path from mayor to one-man rule of Turkey
description: Sunday’s election could decide the future of Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, who has moved toward one-man rule while wielding power on the world stage.

title: Meet the people caught up in Russia’s crackdown on dissent
description: The number of political criminal cases has spiked, with students, an essayist, a theater director and a former law enforcement worker facing years in prison.
